title: INVENTORY MAGAZINE - font ID - serif
content:
Looking for an ID on the font used for the Inventory Mag logo and all the following type below it. I believe they are all from the same type family...

Many thanks for any help in advance,  
Danny

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317132540im_/http:/typophile.com/files/blog_inventory_ps_grid_3_6457.jpg)

Font: 

 Adobe Garamond 

Solved By: 

 [kthomps5](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317132540/http:/typophile.com/user/175823 "View user profile.")

author: Danny_Miller

comments.content: Garamond, but I'll have to research which version (there are dozens).
Adobe Garamond, with small caps and old style figures.
